timeline.bodyText: I think we don't need to catch InterruptedException , just let it be thrown.
timeline.author: vbekiaris

replies.bodyText: As discussed on slack, removing the catch block would change code execution path, so it was restored.

timeline.bodyText:
Can we remove the timed parameter? Seems like we need to parkNanos when timeoutNanos > 0, otherwise just park().
also minor typo: managedParking?
